title: Theirs to Crave
description: No billionaire is alike. Some are cruel, others twisted. There are even a few that drip with sex, yet love to break a woman's heart. Dawn has had her fair share of billionaires, but it seems they haven't finished with her just yet.When she met brothers, Max and Freddy, she played their game for a while and finished it stronger than when she started. Now there's a new game threatening to consume her, and even more players begging for a taste. Dawn can't run from these men anymore. It's time to deal with them one by one, and decide if she's truly theirs to crave.
author: Kenya Wright
